#summary Settings for OpenID plugin

==Normal Google auth==

_Set following setting to your System Settings:_<br/>

`authentication.OpenID.identifier = https://www.google.com/accounts/o8/id`

==Google Apps== 

_Set following setting to your System Settings (replace mydomain.com with your real domain name):_<br/>

`authentication.OpenID.identifier = https://www.google.com/accounts/o8/site-xrds?hd=mydomain.com`
